programlisting: <lexicographicResource uri="http://example.com" langCode="en" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/lexidma/ns/dmlex-1.0"> <entry id="safe"> <headword>safe</headword> <sense id="safe-1"> <indicator>protected from harm</indicator> <example> <text>It isn't safe to park here.</text> </example> </sense> <sense id="safe-2"> <indicator>not likely to cause harm</indicator> <example> <text>Is the ride safe for a small child?</text> </example> </sense> </entry> <entry id="better-safe"> <headword>better safe than sorry</headword> <sense id="better-safe-1"> <definition> <text>you should be careful even if it seems unnecessary</ text> </definition> </sense> </entry> <relation type="subentrying"> <member ref="safe-1" role="container"/> <member ref="better-safe" role="subentry"/> </relation> <relationType type="subentrying" scopeRestriction="sameResource"> <memberType role="container" type="sense" min="1" max="1" hint="navigate"/> <memberType role="subentry" type="entry" min="1" max="1" hint="embed"/> </relationType> </lexicographicResource>
